name: Avem
introduce: Avem is a cross-chain DeFi infrastructure built on top of Polkadot as a Layer 1 Parachain, allowing for the trade and custody of Security and Utility Tokens.Avem are planning to build a Non-Traceable Blockchain as large institutions like to move money around without feeling watched by the rest of the community. Avem blockchain will be regulated with KYC and KYB (Zero Knowledge Proof), to make this mixing of money between institutions and retail a reality.
